name: Escape From Lab. 485
description:
Espace from Lab. 485 is a different type of top-down 3D shooter. Instead of killing the enemies, the bullets pushes back them away from you.

You play as the robot Niel built to be a unbeatable IA war machine. But, after a bug, you gain life and realize that your creators want to use you for evil purposes. You decide to run! Realizing that, the lab 485 leaders order all the other robots to stop you from escaping, and like that, an electrifying getaway starts in the corridors of the lab 485.

Click to give detailed feedback filling up this form
